description: HUDI Dashboard which has been contributed to the OSS project

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.duration | removeEmpty | sum name | count
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieMetadata.basefile.count | removeEmpty | sumSeries name | count
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.totalInsertRecordsWritten | sum | moving 1d sum
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.totalUpdateRecordsWritten | sum | moving 1d sum
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.totalRecordsWritten | sum | moving 1d sum
countSeries(groupByNode(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.userName.*, -1, 'sum'))
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.version.0.7.0 | sumSeries name | count | alias "0.7"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.finalize.duration | sumSeries name | count | diff (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.version.0.7.0 | sumSeries name | count)  | alias "0.5"

panels.description: Total number of  Clean operations / day

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.clean.duration | removeEmpty  | isNonNull | sum | moving 1D sum
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}.HoodieMetadata.lookup_files.count | removeEmpty | sum  | alias "lookup_files"

panels.title: Clean Operations per / Day

panels.description: Total number of  Commit operations / day

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.{commit,deltacommit}.duration | removeEmpty  | isNonNull | sum | moving 1D sum
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}.HoodieMetadata.lookup_files.count | removeEmpty | sum  | alias "lookup_files"

panels.title: Commit Operations per / Day

targets.target: aliasByNode(highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.duration, 10), 1, 6)
aliasByNode(nPercentile(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.duration, 95), 5, 6)
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.clean.duration | sortSeries max desc | head 10
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.clean.numFilesDeleted | sortSeries max desc | head 10
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.clean.duration | max | alias "Maximum"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.clean.duration | sum | nPercentile 95 | alias "P95"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.clean.duration | sum | nPercentile 99 | alias "P99"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.clean.duration | sum | moving 1D avg | alias "AVG"
aliasByNode(highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.totalFilesInsert.count, 10), 1, 6)
aliasByNode(highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.totalFilesUpdate.count, 10), 1, 6)
aliasByNode(highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.clean.numFilesDeleted.count, 10), 1, 6)
aliasByNode(highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.totalInsertRecordsWritten.count, 10), 1, 6)
aliasByNode(highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.totalUpdateRecordsWritten.count, 10), 1, 6)
aliasByNode(highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.totalRecordsWritten.count, 10), 1, 6)
aliasByNode(highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.totalPartitionsWritten.count, 10), 1, 6)
aliasByNode(highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.commit.totalBytesWritten.count, 10), 1, 6)

panels.description: Count of various types of HDFS RPC calls for files outside the .hoodie folder

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem.rename | removeEmpty | sumSeries  | alias "rename"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem.delete | removeEmpty | sumSeries  | alias "delete"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem.listStatus | removeEmpty | sumSeries  | alias "listStatus"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem.mkdirs | removeEmpty | sumSeries  | alias "mkdirs"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem.getFileStatus | removeEmpty | sumSeries  | alias "getFileStatus"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem.globStatus | removeEmpty | sumSeries  | alias "globStatus"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem.listFiles | removeEmpty | sumSeries  | alias "listFiles"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem.open | removeEmpty | sumSeries  | alias "open"

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.delete.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.delete | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "delete"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.create.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.create | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "create"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.rename.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.rename | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "rename"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.listStatus.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.listStatus | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "listStatus"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.mkdirs.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.mkdirs | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "mkdirs"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.getFileStatus.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.getFileStatus | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "getFileStatus"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.globStatus.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.globStatus | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "globStatus"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.listFiles.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.listFiles | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "listFiles"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.read.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.read | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "read"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.write.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.write | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "write"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.open.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.open | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "open"

panels.title: HDFS RPC Calls Timings

panels.description: Counts of of various types of TimelineService API calls

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.ALL_FILEGROUPS_FOR_PARTITION | removeEmpty | sum | alias "ALL_FILEGROUPS_FOR_PARTITION"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.ALL_REPLACED_FILEGROUPS_PARTITION | removeEmpty | sum | alias "ALL_REPLACED_FILEGROUPS_PARTITION"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.LATEST_DATA_FILES_BEFORE_ON_INSTANT | removeEmpty | sum | alias "LATEST_DATA_FILES_BEFORE_ON_INSTANT"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.LATEST_PARTITION_DATA_FILE | removeEmpty | sum | alias "LATEST_PARTITION_DATA_FILE"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.PEDING_COMPACTION_OPS | removeEmpty | sum | alias "PEDING_COMPACTION_OPS"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.LATEST_ALL_DATA_FILES | removeEmpty | sum | alias "LATEST_ALL_DATA_FILES"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.LATEST_DATA_FILE_ON_INSTANT | removeEmpty | sum | alias "LATEST_DATA_FILE_ON_INSTANT"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.ALL_DATA_FILES | removeEmpty | sum | alias "ALL_DATA_FILES"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.LATEST_DATA_FILES_RANGE_INSTANT | removeEmpty | sum | alias "LATEST_DATA_FILES_RANGE_INSTANT"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.* | removeEmpty
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.ALL_REPLACED_FILEGROUPS_BEFORE | removeEmpty | sum | alias "ALL_REPLACED_FILEGROUPS_BEFORE"

panels.title: Total API Calls

panels.description: Timings of various types of TimelineService API calls

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_API_TIME | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_API_CALLS | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "API Time"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_CHECK_TIME | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_API_CALLS | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "Check Time"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_REFRESH_TIME | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_API_CALLS | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "Refresh Time"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_HANDLE_TIME | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_API_CALLS | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "Handle Time"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.WRITE_VALUE_TIME | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.WRITE_VALUE_CNT | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | alias "Json Encoding Time"

panels.title: Timing for operations (Avg)

panels.description: Timings of various types of TimelineService API calls

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_API_TIME | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_API_CALLS | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | nPercentile 95 | alias "TimeLine Service P95"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.listStatus.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sumSeries | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystem*.listStatus | removeEmpty | sumSeries) | nPercentile 95 | alias "HDFS"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_API_TIME | removeEmpty | sumSeries | moving 1D sum | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.TimelineService.TOTAL_API_CALLS | removeEmpty | sumSeries | moving 1D sum) | alias "TimeLine Service AVG"

panels.title: TimelineService API vs HDFS RPC Time

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieWrapperFileSystemMetaFolder.listStatus | sum | moving 1D sum
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}.HoodieMetadata.lookup_files.count | removeEmpty | sum  | alias "lookup_files"

panels.title: ListStatus Calls Required / Day (outside .hoodie folder)

panels.description: Total number of RPC calls saved / day due to the use of Metadata Table

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}.HoodieMetadata.lookup_files.count | removeEmpty | sum  | alias "lookup_files"

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}.HoodieMetadata.lookup_files.count | removeEmpty | sum  | alias "lookup_files"

panels.title: Total listStatus Calls  Removed / Day

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.HoodieMetadata.{lookup_files.count,lookup_partitions.count} | sum | moving 1D sum | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.{HoodieWrapperFileSystemMetaFolder,HoodieWrapperFileSystem,HoodieMetadata}.{lookup_files.count,lookup_partitions.count,listStatus} | removeEmpty | sum | moving 1D sum ) | scale 100

fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}.HoodieMetadata.validate_partitions.totalDuration | removeEmpty | sum  | divideSeries (fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}.HoodieMetadata.validate_partitions.count | removeEmpty | sum ) | alias "validate_partitions"

panels.title: Metadata Logfile Size

panels.description: Number of metadata log files created

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}.HoodieMetadata.logfile.count | removeEmpty | sum name | aliasByTags name

panels.title: Metadata Logfile Count

panels.description: Maximum Time taken for various actions on the Metadata Table

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.deltacommit.duration | removeEmpty | avg | alias "deltacommit"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.compaction.duration | removeEmpty | avg | alias "compaction"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.finalize.duration | removeEmpty | avg | alias "finalize"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.clean.duration | removeEmpty | avg | alias "clean"

panels.title: Metadata Table Actions Duration (Average)

panels.description: Maximum Time taken for various actions on the Metadata Table

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.deltacommit.duration | removeEmpty | max | alias "deltacommit"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.compaction.duration | removeEmpty | max | alias "compaction"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.finalize.duration | removeEmpty | max | alias "finalize"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.clean.duration | removeEmpty | max | alias "clean"

panels.title: Metadata Table Actions Duration (Max)

panels.description: Number of error within the metadata table.

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}.HoodieMetadata.validate_errors.count | removeEmpty | sum name | alias "validate_errors"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}.HoodieMetadata.bootstrap_error.count | removeEmpty | sum name | alias "bootstrap_errors"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}.HoodieMetadata.rebootstrap.count | removeEmpty | sum name | alias "rebootstrap"

panels.title: Metadata Table Errors

panels.description: Records written to Metadata Table in each operation

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.deltacommit.totalInsertRecordsWritten | removeEmpty | sum | alias "deltacommit.inserts"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.deltacommit.totalUpdateRecordsWritten | removeEmpty | sum | alias "deltacommit.updates"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.deltacommit.totalRecordsWritten | removeEmpty | sum | alias "deltacommit.total_records"
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.${Tablefilter}_metadata.compaction.totalRecordsWritten | removeEmpty | sum | alias "compaction.total_records"

panels.title: Metadata Table Record Writes

panels.description: Number of HBase Inserts

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_num_puts env:production dc:dca* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries datafeed | sortSeries current desc | aliasByTags datafeed dc | removeEmpty

fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_num_puts env:production dc:dca* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries datafeed | sortSeries current desc | aliasByTags datafeed dc | removeEmpty | averageSeries | alias "Average"

fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_num_puts env:production dc:dca* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries datafeed | sortSeries current desc | aliasByTags datafeed dc | removeEmpty | minSeries | alias "Min"

fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_num_puts env:production dc:dca* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries datafeed | sortSeries current desc | aliasByTags datafeed dc | removeEmpty | maxSeries | alias "Max"

panels.title: Number of HBase Inserts

panels.description: Total number of HBase Inserts

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_num_puts env:production dc:dca* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries | summarize 15m | alias "Total" | removeEmpty

panels.title: Total HBase Inserts (Summed 15m interval)

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_qps_resources_actual_puts_time_secs env:production dc:* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries datafeed | sortSeries current desc | aliasByTags datafeed dc | removeEmpty

fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_qps_resources_actual_puts_time_secs env:production dc:* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries datafeed | sortSeries current desc | aliasByTags datafeed dc | removeEmpty | averageSeries | alias "Average"

fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_qps_resources_actual_puts_time_secs env:production dc:* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries datafeed | sortSeries current desc | aliasByTags datafeed dc | removeEmpty | minSeries | alias "Min"

fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_qps_resources_actual_puts_time_secs env:production dc:* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries datafeed | sortSeries current desc | aliasByTags datafeed dc | removeEmpty | maxSeries | alias "Max"
fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_qps_resources_actual_puts_time_secs env:production dc:* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries | summarize 15m   | alias "Total" | removeEmpty

panels.title: Total HBase puts time taken (Summed 15m interval)

panels.description: Total number of HBase Clients (Datasets)

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_num_puts env:production dc:dca* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries datafeed | count  | summarize 15m | removeEmpty

panels.title: Total HBase Clients (Summed 15m interval)

panels.description: Total number of HBase Inserts

targets.target: fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_num_puts env:production dc:dca* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries | summarize 1h | alias "Total" | removeEmpty

fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_qps_resources_actual_puts_time_secs env:production dc:* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries | summarize 15m   | alias "Total" | removeEmpty | divideSeries (    fetch service:hoodie datafeed:* name:hbase_num_puts env:production dc:dca* owner:* frequency:* source:* | sumSeries | summarize 15m | alias "Total" | removeEmpty) | alias "Average"

panels.title: Average HBase Put Time / Key (Summed 15m interval)

panels.description: HDFS Storage used by the cluster

targets.target: alias(maxSeries(servers.*.hadoop.{dca1-carbon-prod,magnesium}.hdfs.namenode.CapacityTotalGB), "Total Capacity")
alias(maxSeries(servers.*.hadoop.{dca1-carbon-prod,magnesium}.hdfs.namenode.CapacityUsedGB), "Capacity Used")
alias(asPercent(#B, #A), 'HDFS usage')

panels.title: Cluster HDFS Storage Usage (Carbon + Magnesium)

panels.description: Size of HBase table for the top 25 tables

targets.target: highestMax(groupByNode(servers.hadoop*.hbase.$HbaseClusters.regionserver.tables.*.*.MaxStoreFileSize, 7, 'maxSeries'), 25)

panels.title: HBase Usage (Top 25 tables)

targets.target: alias(percentileOfSeries(removeAboveValue(nonNegativeDerivative(servers.hadoop*.hbase.$HbaseClusters.regionserver.writeRequestCount), 500000), 95, 'false'), '95 percentile')
alias(percentileOfSeries(removeAboveValue(nonNegativeDerivative(servers.hadoop*.hbase.$HbaseClusters.regionserver.writeRequestCount), 500000), 50, 'false'), 'median')
countSeries(averageAbove(servers.hadoop*.hbase.$HbaseClusters.regionserver.MemHeapUsedM, 1))
aliasByNode(highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.deltastreamer.hiveSyncDuration, 10), 1, 6)
aliasByNode(highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.deltastreamer.duration, 10), 1, 6)
aliasByNode(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Tablefilter.replacecommit.duration, 1, 5)
aliasByNode(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Tablefilter.replacecommit.totalPartitionsWritten, 1, 5)
aliasByNode(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Tablefilter.replacecommit.fileCreationTime, 1, 5)
aliasByNode(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Tablefilter.replacecommit.totalFilesInsert, 1, 5)
aliasByNode(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Tablefilter.replacecommit.totalInsertRecordsWritten, 1, 5)
stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Tablefilter.replacecommit.job.failure
scale(nPercentile(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Tablefilter.replacecommit.encryptRecord, 95), 0.000001)
scale(nPercentile(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Tablefilter.replacecommit.totalTransformRecord, 95), 0.000001)

panels.title: Total time taken to transform record 95th percentile

targets.target: sumSeries(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.consolidated.totalRecordsWritten.CREATE)
divideSeries(sumSeries(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.consolidated.cumulativeParquetWriteTimeInUSec.CREATE), #A)
sumSeries(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.consolidated.totalRecordsWritten.MERGE)
divideSeries(sumSeries(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.consolidated.cumulativeParquetWriteTimeInUSec.MERGE), #A)
sumSeries(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.consolidated.cumulativeParquetWriteTimeInUSec.CREATE)
sumSeries(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.consolidated.cumulativeParquetWriteTimeInUSec.MERGE)
sumSeries(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.consolidated.totalRecordsWritten.CREATE)
sumSeries(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.consolidated.totalRecordsWritten.MERGE)
highestMax(stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.writeTimePerRecordInUSec.CREATE.*.*.*.*, 200)
fetch service:hoodie type:gauges dc:$dc name:$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.writeTimePerRecordInUSec.MERGE.**  | sortSeries current desc  | head 200
stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.consolidated.bloomIndexSearchTime
stats.$dc.gauges.hoodie.$Environment.$Dataset.$Tablefilter.DistributedMetrics.*.consolidated.bloomIndexFileRecords

title: Hoodie_OSS
